template_name: Jumper Flare v2.1 - Authentic Jumper Design
description: Corrected design system based on official Jumper Studio brand reference images. Removes glass-morphism in favor of flat solid backgrounds, enforces square corners (no border-radius), uses pure black (#000000), and mandates left-aligned text (NEVER centered). Features 26 slide patterns including new: Big Number with Arrow, Layout dos 4 Cantos, Signature Slide, Notification Cards, and White Theme variant.

changes: CRITICAL: Changed to pure black (#000000) from #0a0a0a
CRITICAL: Set border-radius: 0 on all cards/badges/buttons (charts exception)
CRITICAL: Enforced left-aligned text throughout (NEVER center)
NEW: Big Number with Arrow pattern (from 53.png reference)
NEW: Layout dos 4 Cantos pattern (from 61.png reference)
NEW: Signature Slide pattern (from Frame 4.png reference)
NEW: Arrow indicators (directional: down, up, right, left)
Simplified hover states (no transform, no glow shadows)
Cards now use solid backgrounds with subtle borders
Initial v2 release (deprecated - design errors identified)

core_principles: FLAT: No glass-morphism, no blur effects, solid backgrounds only
SQUARE: No border-radius on UI elements (charts excepted for legibility)
SHARP: Hard cuts between areas, no fade transitions
LEFT: Text NEVER centered, always left or right aligned
CORNERS: Layout dos 4 cantos - text in corners, center empty
SIMPLE: Use Unicode arrows (→↓↑←) not emojis for indicators
typography_rules: Large typography positioned in corners, never centered
Only exception: Logo in signature slide may be centered

section_1_abertura.purpose: Opening impact with sharp gradient cut

new_patterns_v2_1.name: Big Number with Arrow
new_patterns_v2_1.description: Massive number in top-left with orange directional arrow below. Supporting italic text in bottom-left corner. Inspired by reference image 53.png.
new_patterns_v2_1.when_to_use: When ONE statistic needs maximum impact - typically negative/alarming stats or record achievements
new_patterns_v2_1.example: 92,4% ↓ da sua audiencia pode estar fora do seu alcance
design_notes: Number and arrow left-aligned, never centered
Lots of negative space - let the number breathe

new_patterns_v2_1.name: Layout dos 4 Cantos
new_patterns_v2_1.description: Grid layout with content in all four corners and empty center. Text positioned top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right. Inspired by reference image 61.png.
new_patterns_v2_1.when_to_use: For slides that need balanced visual weight with multiple pieces of information
new_patterns_v2_1.example: TL: Category label | TR: Date | BL: Main headline + description | BR: Arrow indicator
design_notes: Center area intentionally empty or subtle background
Each corner aligned to its edge (tl=left, tr=right, etc.)
Use with gradient overlays for visual interest
Arrow indicator in corner-br for navigation hint

new_patterns_v2_1.name: Signature Slide (Closing)
new_patterns_v2_1.description: Professional closing slide with logo centered (only exception to no-center rule) and author name/title in bottom-left corner. Orange accent bar at top. Inspired by Frame 4.png.
new_patterns_v2_1.when_to_use: Final slide of presentation for professional sign-off
new_patterns_v2_1.example: Orange bar + Jumper Logo (center) + Bruno Maya + CEO, Jumper Studio (bottom-left)
design_notes: ONLY pattern where logo is centered

new_patterns_v2_1.name: Notification Cards
new_patterns_v2_1.description: Mobile notification-style cards with source, date, title, and description. Flat design with subtle borders. Inspired by reference images 59.png and 72.png.
new_patterns_v2_1.when_to_use: Showing recent updates, activity logs, news items
new_patterns_v2_1.example: Google Ads | Nov 24 | Campaign optimization complete | All ad groups optimized
design_notes: Source in caps, date right-aligned in header

new_patterns_v2_1.name: White Theme Variant
new_patterns_v2_1.description: Inverted color scheme with white background and dark text. Provides visual break in dark presentations. Inspired by reference image 54.png.
new_patterns_v2_1.when_to_use: Mid-presentation break, contrast moment, or content that needs different treatment
new_patterns_v2_1.example: White background + black headers + gray body text + orange badge accent
design_notes: Orange accents still work on white

patterns.name: Hero Split Right (Cover)
patterns.description: 50/50 split with black content left and gradient image right. SHARP cut between areas - no fade transition. Content left-aligned within its panel.
required_elements: content-inner with h1, subtitle, body text

patterns.name: Hero Split Left (Closing)
patterns.description: Reverse of hero-split-right: gradient left, content right. Sharp cut. Used for closing slides with CTAs.

patterns.name: Table of Contents
patterns.description: Grid of numbered TOC items with left-aligned titles and descriptions. Flat cards with subtle borders.

patterns.name: Section Header
patterns.description: Badge + large section title + description. All content left-aligned.

patterns.name: Section Divider
patterns.description: Large section number with title. Number in subtle color, orange vertical bar accent.

patterns.name: Cards Grid (Flat)
patterns.description: Responsive grid of flat cards with solid backgrounds. No glass-morphism. Square corners.

patterns.name: Metric Cards
patterns.description: Grid of compact metric cards with large values. Left-aligned within each card.
required_elements: metric-card with metric-label, metric-value, optional metric-trend

patterns.name: Hero Metric
patterns.description: Large metric value in orange with label and context. Left-aligned.

patterns.name: Comparison Grid
patterns.description: Two-column comparison with large stats. Semantic colors for before (muted) and after (success).
required_elements: comparison-item after with values and labels

patterns.name: Statement Slide
patterns.description: 60/40 split with bold text left and supporting visual right. Left-aligned text.

patterns.name: Data Table
patterns.description: Full data table with flat row styling. Left-aligned columns.

patterns.name: Data List
patterns.description: Two-column data list with label-value rows. Orange highlight for key rows.

patterns.name: Timeline Horizontal
patterns.description: Horizontal timeline with square dot markers. Values color-coded by stage.
required_elements: timeline-items with date, dot, value, label

patterns.name: Timeline Vertical
patterns.description: Vertical timeline with orange accent line. Square dot markers.

patterns.name: Checklist
patterns.description: List of completed items with check icons. Flat cards, left-aligned.

patterns.name: Line Chart
patterns.description: SVG line chart with insights panel. Charts KEEP rounded corners for legibility.
patterns.design_exception: Charts may use border-radius for legibility

patterns.name: Bar Chart Horizontal
patterns.description: Horizontal bar chart with semantic colors. Charts keep rounded corners.

patterns.name: Donut Chart
patterns.description: SVG donut chart with legend panel. Left-aligned legend items.

patterns.name: Funnel Chart
patterns.description: Multi-stage funnel with drop-off badges. Progressive narrowing.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing conversion process with drop-off rates

patterns.name: Gauge Chart
patterns.description: Semi-circular gauge showing progress. Color-coded by performance level.

arrow_indicators.description: Simple Unicode arrows for directional indicators. NEVER use emojis.
arrow_indicators.down: ↓ or ↓ - Use for decreases, drops, scroll down
arrow_indicators.up: ↑ or ↑ - Use for increases, growth, scroll up
arrow_indicators.right: → or → - Use for next, continue, action

accent_bar_top.description: 4px orange bar at top of slide

accent_bar_left.description: 4px orange bar at left of element

critical_rules: NEVER center text - always left or right aligned
NEVER use border-radius on cards/badges/buttons (charts excepted)
ALWAYS use pure black #000000 for backgrounds
Use Unicode arrows (→↓) NOT emojis for indicators
pattern_selection_rules: Use big-number-arrow for dramatic single statistics
Use layout-corners for case studies with multiple info pieces
Use section-header to introduce major topics
Place metric-cards early for quick KPI overview
Choose chart type based on data type
End with checklist → (optional white slide) → hero-split-left → signature-slide

semantic_color_usage.warning: #F59E0B - Neutral items, moderate issues, testing status
